title: How do I set Yahoo Mail as the default in Firefox?
content:
I searched, and all the internet results I find tell me to look in the settings:applications:mailto ddlb and select Yahoo. The problem is that it's not there.

There is a "use other" but there's no hint on how I'd tell it to open https://mail.yahoo.com.

How do I get it to open Yahoo mail?

This is on W11.
creator: ithinktfiam

title: how to change my primary email address
content:
